name: Tetris: Bot Attack
description:
It's a classic game of Tetris with your friend/enemy Tedbot!

======================================================

Arrow Keys = Move

A/S = Rotate

W = Hold

Escape = Pause

(Some features have been disabled in the browser version for compatibility)

=======================================================

This is just a little experimental game I made to get used to working with a game engine. I do have more ideas and bits of code leftover for this, such as implementing hats and a new game mode, though for now I plan to work on bigger and better projects.

The entire Godot project can be found on GitHub (https://github.com/natebouchat/Tetris_Bot_Attack) if you'd like to poke around and see how this does what it does.
